|stockos = Linux;2.4.20;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, unpopulated,, 6-pin header,, (115200 8N1),, 3.3V TTL,, J3 |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = NETGEAR |defaultssid_regex = ^NETGEAR$ |default_ch = |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U12H139 |manuf_rev = .99 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/16/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China, Vietnam |buttons = |led = |dimensions = 28 x 175 x 118 mm (1.1 x 6.9 x 4.7 in) |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "U12H139T99" and "Rev.0 GP" is silkscreened on the boards. :The same hardware is also used for the [[Netgear WGR614v10]]. OUIs may include 20:4E:7F, [http://git.chromium.org/gitweb/?p=chromiumos/third_party/autotest.git;a=blob;f=server/cros/chaos_static_ap_list.conf;h=96ffe88e6ec025cb32eabb71d13ca12b0b0feb39;hb=dcaefdda36ec9e3c281d70ccabb2ec900efce1a7 84:1B:5E OUI] same HW as WGR614 v10 [[Netgear WGR614v10]] ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=68621 On the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki] {{OpenWrtTechData|https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_wnr1000_v3}} {{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wnr1000_v3}} ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
(GND) (TxD) (...) (...) (RxD) (+3.3v)
  o     o     o     o     o     o
  6     5     4     3     2     1
                       J3
